title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' issue in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui. Selecting 'xxx' as destination.
OB: After the operation, 'xx' contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: Expected behavior is that it should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open 'jdt.ui'
2. Select 'xxx' as the destination
3. Perform the 'copy package' operation
4. Observe the resulting package structure in 'xx'
